title: Dungeon Siege I-II Multiplayer Guide
description:
Include in this file is Hamachi a VPN. It does work. Just follow the text in this torrent. Even if your copy of DS is pirated. You can still host or join games hosted over lan with Hamachi. Hamachi works with many games, and can do several other things such as setting up a network to share files ect. If anyone is interested in playing a multiplayer game.
